oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session and interview - Ashley Monroe - 2018-06-09
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Ashley Monroe and interview by Tyler Mahan Coe from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 9, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ashley Monroe; Tyler Mahan Coe;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in Music / (04:53) Opening comments and introductions by Abi Tapia / (07:40) Opening comments / (97:56) Performs Hands On You / (11:49) Tyler asks about Ashley's frame of mind when she wrote Hands On You / () Talk about the Sparrow album and writing using imagination and writing using real life situations / (14:53) Introduces and performs Mother's Daughter / (20:00) Ashley talks about her songwriting influences / (21:37) Ashley talks about her live album recorded at Third Man Records and her comment on the recording that her songs are obscure / (22:18) Ashley talks about writing the song She Wakes Me Up / (24:44) Performs She Wakes Me Up / (27:15) Ashley talks about the production on her Sparrow album and how the string arrangements came about / (29:51) Ashley talks about writing the song Wild Love (30:27) Performs Wild Love / (35:00) Talks about the writing of the song Wild Love / (36:07) Ashley talks about how having a child influenced her songwriting / (37:47) Introduces the next song / (38:22) Performs Paying Attention / (41:45) Talk about what country music is / (43:25) Talks about tuning her guitar and tell Jon Randall story / (44:12) Introduces the next song / (45:16) Performs Daddy I Told You / (48:55) Closing comments / (50:36) Final comments /(51:00) Walk-out music / (51:21) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:format: original source recorded as an mp3 file at 44.1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monroe, Ashley; Coe, Tyler Mahan; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
